name: Thewoogie's Insane Asylum
description:
A mod of Baldi's Basics.

Welcome to Thewoogie's Insane Asylum, home of mentally crazy people, and the resting place of the Chaos Emeralds. Thewoogie is a bit of a narcissist, everything in the hospital is branded around him, so he doesn't like anyone having the Chaos Emeralds. You've stumbled into the place randomly, and it seems like the only way out is to take the emeralds and leave. If the wacky cast of patients and staff don't get in your way, of course.

Can you escape Thewoogie's Insane Asylum?

#baldi #mod
